definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: The Atkins Diet is a departure from the previously prevailingmetabolic theories.
sentences.chinese: 阿特金斯饮食偏离了以前流行的新陈代谢理论。

sentences.english: All living matter undergoes a process of metabolism.
The supersession of the old by the new is a general, eternal and inviolable law of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 新陈代谢是宇宙间普遍的永远不可抵抗的规律。

sentences.english: They also help the body break down collagen in skin production.
sentences.chinese: 他们还有助于分解肌肤新陈代谢中产生的胶原质。

sentences.english: Short sleepers also tend to be thin and have faster metabolisms.
sentences.chinese: 短睡眠者通常会很瘦并且新陈代谢很快。

sentences.english: It enhances human metabolism, increases respiration rate, and raises blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 它能增强人体新陈代谢，提升呼吸率，并升高血压。

sentences.english: ADH signals the kidney to slow down production.
sentences.chinese: 抗利尿激素向肾脏发出减慢新陈代谢的信号。

sentences.english: And it’s been linked to cancer and metabolic disorders leading to obesity.
sentences.chinese: 癌症和新陈代谢紊乱导致的肥胖也被认为与此有关。

sentences.english: From its location in the neck, the thyroid secretes hormones that affect metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 位于颈部的甲状腺分泌甲状腺素影响机体的新陈代谢。

sentences.english: Our diet custom pities the tree top olive to change can affect metabolism efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我们的饮食习悯梢橄有所改变都会影响新陈代谢效率。

sentences.english: Chromium boosts the metabolism which helps shed the fat that is covering your abs.
sentences.chinese: 铬则能促进新陈代谢，这有助于消耗腹部脂肪。

sentences.english: And some research suggests that eating hot foods such as chiles may even help to keep the good ol' metabolism healthfully high.
sentences.chinese: 有些研究认为，食用辣椒等辣味食品有助于新陈代谢。

sentences.english: Metabolism is a measurement of the Autonomic Nervous System.
sentences.chinese: 新陈代谢是衡量植物神经系统。

sentences.english: Vitreous body metabolism is slow, haemorrhage draws displeasure.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃体新陈代谢慢，出血吸收不快。

sentences.english: Today’s Moment of Science unravels the parts of metabolism. But first, what is metabolism really?
Green tea has been proven to help boost metabolism and speed up weight loss.
sentences.chinese: 已有证明，縁茶能促进新陈代谢，强化减肥效果。

definition: catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
to expel poison (from the system)/to detox
to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
the body/organism (usually human)/(fig.) fabric (of society etc)/cohesive structure (of an entity)
